sentences.en: ...Lake Baringo, a freshwater haven for a mixed variety of birds.
sentences.cn: …百瑞高湖，一个适合各种鸟类的淡水栖息地。

sentences.en: "How will you contact me?" —"We haven't worked that out yet."
sentences.cn: “你们怎么跟我联系？”——“我们还没想出来呢。”

sentences.en: "You haven't got the right attitude," he said sulkily.
sentences.cn: 他怄气道：“你态度不端正。”

sentences.en: Get out. Haven't you screwed things up enough already!
sentences.cn: 滚出去。事情给你搞得还不够糟啊！

sentences.en: Haven'tthey got enough problems there already?
sentences.cn: 难道他们那儿的问题还少吗？

sentences.en: I haven't come all this way to bottle out.
sentences.cn: 我一路走来不是为了在最后关头打退堂鼓。

sentences.en: I haven'tthe faintest idea how to care for a snake.
If you have never been to an opera, you haven't lived.
sentences.cn: 要是从来没看过歌剧，那就枉过此生了。

sentences.en: Many people haven't heard of reflexology.
sentences.cn: 很多人没听说过反射学。

sentences.en: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.cn: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

sentences.en: The police haven't really done anything for the black community in particular.
sentences.cn: 警方并未真正特意为黑人群体做什么.

sentences.en: They haven't had a square meal for four or five days.
sentences.cn: 他们已经四五天没吃上一顿像样的饭了。

sentences.en: We haven't been introduced. My name is Nero Wolfe.
sentences.cn: 还没人介绍我们。我叫尼罗·沃尔夫。

sentences.en: You haven't lived until you've used their new micro system.
sentences.cn: 要是没用过他们新的微系统，这辈子就算白活了。

sentences.en: You haven't put any money in the kitty for three weeks.
sentences.cn: 你有3个星期没往里凑钱了。

sentences.en: You've changed your tune since this morning, haven't you?
sentences.cn: 你从今天早上就变卦了，是不是？

phrases.tran_cn: 纽黑文市（美国康涅狄格州港市）
避税场所（税率很低的国家或地区）

trans.tran_cn: 港口，安全地方，避难所，安息所
trans.tran_en: a place where people or animals can live peacefully or go to in order to be safe

trans.tran_cn: 为……提供避难处；安置……于港中
